data.title: Gilan Province
data.text:
Iran's tea leaves production up 42%

Rasht, IRNA – The head of the Tea Organization of Iran has said that production of green tea leaves in Gilan and Mazandaran provinces, both located in northern Iran, has increased by 42% this year compared to the same period last year.

10 months ago

Conservation of historic artifacts in Iran's Gilan

A program has started for conservation of cultural heritage at the Gilan Rural Heritage Museum located near the city of Rasht in Gilan province, in northern Iran. The General Directorate of Museums supervises the conservation process of more than 50 valuable artifacts. (IRNA photos published on September 11, 2023/Mojtaba Mohammadi)

11 months ago

Over 2k residential units delivered to applicants in Iran’s Gilan

On the occasion of Government Week (starting on August 24), 2,064 residential units relating to the National Housing Action Plan were handed over to the applicants in a ceremony attended by the governor-general of Gilan province Asadollah Abbasi in the Iranian northern province of Gilan on August 28, 2023. (IRNA photos/Mojtaba Mohammadi)

11 months ago

Iran reports 21% increase in tea production

Tehran, IRNA – Green tea leaf production in the northern Iranian provinces of Gilan and Mazandaran has increased by 21% in the current Iranian year (started March 21), according to the head of Iran Tea Organization Hamid Jahansaaz.

Older than a year

Nostalgic exhibition of Iranian Gilani women garments

A nostalgic exhibition of women’s last three decades' garments that kicked off at the Rasht Museum of Anthropology in Iran’s northern province of Gilan on July 12 is underway today. (IRNA photos/Mojtaba Mohammadi)

Older than a year

Discovery of 7K years old early herders’ camp on Mountaintop near Masouleh, Gilan

Tehran, IRNA - Following recent discoveries of late prehistoric and historic sites on the mountain ranges in the Core Zone of Masouleh in the Gilan province, a new important discovery was announced by Fereidoun Biglari, a senior researcher at the National Museum of Iran and the director of the survey project in the Masouleh region.

Older than a year

Hyrcanian Forests cultural, natural heritage

Rasht, IRNA - Hyrcanian Forests' inscription on UNESCO World Heritage List took place on July 10, 2019, so the Iranians residing in Gilan Province plan to hold artistic and cultural festivals in order to introduce the significant natural heritage to the world.

Older than a year

Indian Lotus in Iran’s Gilan Prov

Indian Lotus is regarded as one of the two extant species of aquatic plant which grows in lakes, wetlands as well as swamps. The beautiful plant plays an effective role in the degradation of detergents and chemicals. Its reduction poses environmental threats to the wetland. Rasht, Gilan Province. July 28, 2021.IRNA/ Mojtaba Mohammadi

Older than a year

Spring blossoms in winter time; Northern Iran

Early blossoms of trees in Gilan province, Iran, in February and March may bring about big losses for farmers because winter is yet to finish in the freezing weather of the province. Rasht, Iran, February 28, 2021. IRNA/Mojtaba Mohammadi.

Older than a year

Kasma Bath: ّFirst historical bath in Gilan province

Kasma Bath is one of the historical monuments of Someh Sara, which belongs to the Qajar Dynasty and is located in the central part of Kasma village. It is registered as one of the national monuments of Iran. The bath has two Howz of hot and cold water, (In traditional Persian architecture, a howz is a centrally positioned symmetrical axis pool. If in a traditional house or private courtyard, it is used for bathing, aesthetics or both). Rasht, Gilan Province, Iran. June 15, 2020. IRNA/ Farzad Hassanpour.

Older than a year

Gilan province non-oil exports increase by 16 pct.

Rasht, June 6, IRNA – The head of Iran's Gilan province Industry, Mine and Trade Organization said on Saturday that the province's exports in last two months increased by $80 million showing 16 percent growth compared to the same period last year.
